data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Ciego de Ávila to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ciego de Ávila, Cuba
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ciego de Ávila to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who are far from you in Ciego de Ávila. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Ciego de Ávila, Cuba need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Florencia
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Florencia, Ciego de Ávila, Cuba.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Ciego de Ávila.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Ciego de Ávila, Cuba to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 47,904 believers in Ciego de Ávila to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

location.name: Ciego de Ávila
location.cities_list: Ciego de Ávila, Morón, Ciro Redondo, Chambas, Florencia
